name: Nuk'em Loans
description: Nukem provides loans, leverage and staking to crypto-native users through a simple “uniswap style” UI/UX where you can borrow from lenders; who can create capital efficient liquidity pools in a permissionless manner. Nukem Loans contracts incorporate mechanisms designed to minimize the associated investment risks, providing a secure and efficient platform for users to engage in lending activities wholly based on the ERC4626 tokenised vault standards.
